Articles.Content:
KSP missions are very fun, but, sometimes, taking science readings can get kind of boring and It would be cool to do some science in a different way. Maybe, It would be nice to build a probe, take screenshots and pretend It's a telescope or Imitate gravity with a spinning disc orbiting Kerbin.

That's why I created this mission Idea. My suggestion is to just that! Create a vessel and do something interesting with it, maybe use some existing in game science equipment, like the readings on the thermometer or double-C Seismic accelerometer.
